DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
This effect has not yet been included and is currently on my to-do list.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
For every 3 stacks of [#8b0000]Vicious you deal 1 and take 2 extra damage. Certain cards gain new effects based on [#8b0000]Vicious.
Gain Vicious to debuff your enemies or force their actions.
Can only be applied to non-attacking enemies. NL Taunted enemies are forced to attack.
Can only be applied to attacking enemies. NL Intimidated enemies are forced to defend and gain Block equal to 10 plus half your Vicious.
Armor Piercing X: NL Enemies lose HP equal to X% their destroyed Block.
Rending X: NL Enemies take X% extra damage if they don't have block.
Continue attacking if the stated condition is fulfilled.
Evolving Cards specializing in Lacerate.
[#b7410e]Lacerated creatures lose 2% of their Max HP, per stack, every turn (minimum 1).
Increase the power of all Fenrir cards by 1 whenever you meet the condition.
Cards specializing in deck cycling and against buffed enemies.
[#cdfcfe]Flash [#cdfcfe]X: Discard up to X cards. Gain 2 bonus damage per card, activate the effect when discarding X. Draw one card for every card discarded after the first.
Balanced in offense and defense, specializing in Mana Burn.

Creatures affected by [#3abfbe]Mana [#3abfbe]burn lose 3% Max HP per stack when casting buffs, debuffs and spells. Certain cards gain new effects against creatures affected by [#3abfbe]Mana [#3abfbe]burn.
Trigger target enemy's Mana Burn.
Cards specializing against enemies with Block and defensive powers.
Staggered creatures deal and gain 25-50% less damage and block respectively.
Focused on the player's HP and Vicious generation.
Gain max HP if you kill the target before the end of your turn. Gain more the higher their current HP is.
